charges.charge_description: 8:1326B.F REENTRY OF DEPORTED ALIEN-FELONY-Illegal Reentry of Previously Deported Felon on or about 6/12/02 in Albany County (1)

On or about 6/12/02 in Albany county, in the NDNY deft.; Carlton Edward Smith aka Kevin Carter, a native and citizen of Jamaica having been previously deported from the US on or about 12/23/97, and not having obtained permission to reenter the US from the AG, was found to be knowingly, intentionally, and unlawfully in the US in violation of Title 8 USC, Section(s) 1326(a) &; 1326(b)(2). [1:02-m-321]
